import React, { useState } from "react"; import Modal from "react-modal"; import "./ProductSection.css"; // Ensure styles are linked correctly const ProductSection = () => { const [modalData, setModalData] = useState(null); // ✅ Products categorized into Featured, Arrivals, and On Sale const products = { featured: [ { id: 1, primaryImage: "/images/product/1.jpg", name: "Necklace", category: "Jewelry", currentPrice: "₹44,015", description: "Elegant gold necklace with diamonds.", rating: 4.5 }, { id: 2, primaryImage: "/images/product/2.jpg", name: "Earrings", category: "Jewelry", platinum chain.", rating: 4.9 }, ], }; const openModal = (product) => setModalData(product); const closeModal = () => setModalData(null); return (
